title: Iterative Learning-Based Simulation Education for SMB Process Design and Operation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Aims to acquire SMB process design and optimization skills in a virtual environment simulating real industrial settings

learning_goals: Learners can improve separation efficiency by over 15% by analyzing optimal flow conditions for each of the four zones in the SMB (Solid Matrix Block) process.
Through iterative learning design, learners can diagnose and improve process variables using PLS (Partial Least Squares)-based data analysis techniques.
Learners can maintain process stability by applying cycle-to-cycle and within-cycle design strategies in a simulated environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
